{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3569806,"name":"Nathan Zhou","username":"NathanZhou","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nathanzhou/{size}/225374_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-27T03:26:18.613Z","cooked":"

In CNSH two weeks ago, our team become the victim of counterfeit MK ES17-12. These counterfeit battery appears to be way lighter (about 9 lbs~ in comparison to 12.9 lbs~) and cannot handle the energy robot require (easier to brownout).

MK don‚Äôt really do business in China because of local competition. Most listings of ES17-12 in Taobao are NOT genuine. This model of battery are usually made in Vietnam thus cheap price could be a red flag (¬•250 RMB / $34 USD~ just seems ‚Äútoo good to be true‚Äù, if you compare this to pre-tax pre-shipping price in Andymark).

Any counterfeit battery should be immediately removed from use and properly disposed.

I wouldn‚Äôt be so certain that they are counterfeit. They may not meet quality standards, but that is separate - and if they are not counterfeit, MK will usually make it right.

MK recently (last five years) opened a major new facility in Vietnam.
The batteries coming out of that facility have a part number including an ‚ÄúX‚Äù and have not always been good for FRC use, they had a acid seal issue two years ago for example that led to their representative making a CD Account to address our community directly.

$34USD each is similar to the FRC price in the USA direct from MK - even after pricing in a distributor markup, they‚Äôre still $50USD for 2-packs through major FRC suppliers. Compare to Duracell‚Äôs $72USD shelf price‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs always worthwhile to check for underweight batteries. Iirc the Interstate batteries in the kit of parts a couple years ago were all underweight & performed similarly to what you‚Äôre describing.

MK don‚Äôt really do business in China. Most major battery retailer don‚Äôt carry them (Unless you search deep online). They don‚Äôt have a distributor in china. The closest we get is the one in Australia.

mkbattery.com

International Distribution Centers | MK Battery

Find contact information and location details for international distribution centers for MK Battery products. Search for the nearest MK distribution center.
